overview: “Lost & Found Video Night” is of U.S. drinking age and ready to chug margaritas, motherfucker!  Welcome to “Lost & Found Video Night Vol. 21!” Featuring political hacks, conspiracy theorists, Andy Kaufman’s SNL audition, a hypnotized Mornton Downey Jr discussing his extremely boring experience with aliens, the Turkish “Sopranos”, Stanley Kubrick explaining “2001: A Space Odyssey”, Coffin Joe on “The John Stewart Show”, the short film “Samuel Beckett’s ‘Breath’” directed by Damian Hirst, music from Wire, The Association, The Subsonics and maybe even more bands with “The” in their names, and MUCH, MUCH more!
title: Lost & Found Video Night Vol. 21
